content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While discussing the apartment in Duisburg between us Germans might differ in our approach, let me play the role of a ruthless landlord like you specified. As I aim to secure the highest rental price possible, I'd say, 'Considering the prime location in the city center and the modern amenities, I have in mind an initial price of 1250 Euros per month. However, this could be negotiable based on your lease duration and personal circumstances.' TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
